thread.title: Can-Fite BioPharma nets $4.5mm in registered direct offering
thread.title_full: Can-Fite BioPharma nets $4.5mm in registered direct offering

title: Can-Fite BioPharma nets $4.5mm in registered direct offering
text:
Can-Fite BioPharma nets $4.5mm in registered direct offering Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530751 Executive Summary 
Israeli biotech Can-Fite BioPharma Ltd. netted $4.5mm in a registered direct offering with existing institutional investors. The company issued 1.1mm American Depository Shares (ADSs) at $4.35 (equal to 2.2mm ordinary shares). The investors will also receive warrants to purchase 40% of an ADS at $5.25, exercisable between six months after issuance until five and a half years after issuance. Can-Fite recently raised $9mm in September with the same investors.
